180 It was just confirmed not ONLY did Antifa plot an ambush on TPUSA's UC Berkeley event last night - but leftists are fraudulently GRABBING UP tickets to their events EN MASSE to make sure less conservatives can attend. posted 22 hours ago by I-am-Orlando PRO 2 comments award share report block Eric Daugherty @EricLDaugh • 22h 🚨 BREAKING: It was just confirmed not ONLY did Antifa plot an ambush on TPUSA's UC Berkeley event last night - but leftists are fraudulently GRABBING UP tickets to their events EN MASSE to make sure less conservatives can attend. We are up against TRULY despicable people.
